title: Heretic

description:
One year later, an update!

I've corrected the drums (and made readable). As far as I can tell thus far, they should be pretty close.

I haven't touched the guitars, as I don't know how they would be best combined.

I've also not added a vocal track at this time. Reason being I'm not very good at Matt's vocals.

Changed names for Bass track and Drums, but not guitars since that can be done when it's decided which tracks are best suited for Zacky and Synyster.
title: Heretic
